phrases.phrase: A report can not be created for the content type: {content_type}.
By default, resolve an contents report when creating a warning.
Only allow moderators to see reports from forums they can see
Changes the selection criteria for alerts when a report comment is created.

templates.template: 0 {xen:phrase sv_x_state_change_report_assigned, 'name={xen:helper username, $user, 'subject'}', 'report={xen:raw $content.report.contentTitle}' } 1 {xen:phrase sv_x_state_change_report_open, 'name={xen:helper username, $user, 'subject'}', 'report={xen:raw $content.report.contentTitle}' } 1 {xen:phrase sv_x_state_change_report_resolved, 'name={xen:helper username, $user, 'subject'}', 'report={xen:raw $content.report.contentTitle}' } 1 {xen:phrase sv_x_state_change_report_rejected, 'name={xen:helper username, $user, 'subject'}', 'report={xen:raw $content.report.contentTitle}' } 1 {xen:phrase sv_x_acknowledged_a_warning, 'name={xen:helper username, $user, 'subject'}', 'report={xen:raw $content.report.contentTitle}' } 1 {xen:phrase sv_x_issued_a_warning_on_report, 'name={xen:helper username, $user, 'subject'}', 'report={xen:raw $content.report.contentTitle}' } 1 {xen:phrase sv_x_reported_on_report, 'name={xen:helper username, $user, 'subject'}', 'report={xen:raw $content.report.contentTitle}' } {xen:phrase sv_x_commented_on_report, 'name={xen:helper username, $user, 'subject'}', 'report={xen:raw $content.report.contentTitle}' }

{xen:if $comment.like_date, {xen:phrase unlike}, {xen:phrase like}}
{xen:link reports/likes, $report, 'report_comment_id={$comment.report_comment_id}'}

<xen:title>{xen:phrase 'sv_report_comment_by_x', 'username={$comment.username}'} - {xen:if $like, '{xen:phrase sv_unlike_report_comment}', '{xen:phrase sv_like_report_comment}'}</xen:title>
<xen:navigation> <xen:breadcrumb source="$nodeBreadCrumbs" /> <xen:breadcrumb href="{xen:link reports/comment, $report, 'report_comment_id={$comment.report_comment_id}'}">{xen:helper threadPrefix, $report}{$report.title}</xen:breadcrumb> </xen:navigation>
<form action="{xen:link 'reports/like', $report, 'report_comment_id={$comment.report_comment_id}'}" method="post" class="xenForm">
<dl class="ctrlUnit fullWidth"> <dt></dt> <dd> <xen:if is="{$like}"> {xen:phrase sv_you_sure_you_want_to_unlike_this_report_comment} <xen:else /> {xen:phrase sv_you_sure_you_want_to_like_this_report_comment} </xen:if> </dd> </dl>
<dl class="ctrlUnit submitUnit"> <dt></dt> <dd><input type="submit" value="{xen:if $like, '{xen:phrase sv_unlike_report_comment}', '{xen:phrase sv_like_report_comment}'}" accesskey="s" class="button primary" autofocus="true" /></dd> </dl>
<input type="hidden" name="_xfToken" value="{$visitor.csrf_token_page}" /> </form>
